comment.body:
Currently, I'm not home, but yes anyways:
[ThunderWave](/thunderwave.bit)
and also, (though I believe @Krixano is inactive currently), [ImportantZites](/15Pf9VVuDT8NSWj1qUBh4V89yPmrmzRw6a) by.. Krixano

Plus: A lot of Zites are actually Open Source, @Mkg20001 has quite a few (for example ZeroMe alpha it's called, I think). Just look around a little bit ;)

Whrn I'm back home, I'll be starting a note-app (You can check [my GitHub](https://github.com/AnthyG))
